description: This is the Commentary of Galen on the Book of Hippocrates On Prognostics (Tafsīr Jālīnūs li-kitāb Buqrāṭ fī taqdimat al-maʿrifah). This copy is unsigned and undated. The appearance of the paper, ink, and script suggest a dating of before the end of the thirteenth century, possibly in Syria or Egypt.
title: The Commentary of Galen on the Book of Hippocrates On Prognostics (Tafsīr Jālīnūs li-kitāb Buqrāṭ fī taqdimat al-maʿrifah)
author: Galen
